includeIf.querystring:
Select count(ASSET) NBR, STATUS, ORGANISM, IF(ORGANISM in ('02','10','01') , concat('MRN_SPE03#01#Unit ',ORGANISM), concat('MRN_SPE03#02#Log ',ORGANISM)) AddInfo
from MRQR_ASSETS A where A.ASSET like 'FA0%' GROUP BY ORGANISM, STATUS limit 50

Select concat('MRN_SPE05#LI',ASSET,'#',ASSET) DD, concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',MRC,'#1#',MRC) MRC, concat('MRN_SPE09#06##',ASSET,'#1#',ASSET) ASSET, concat('MRN_SPE01#ASSETA&arg1=',ASSET) ILIAS, concat('MRN_SPE09#05##',NSN,'#1#',NSN) NSN, concat('MRN_SPE01#SPART&arg1=',NSN) ILIAS2, concat('MRN_SPE07#PN',PN,'#',MFR) PN_MFR, if(STATUS='D',concat('MRN_SPE03#07#MRN_SPE10#AS#',STATUS),concat('MRN_SPE10#AS#',STATUS)) STATUS, SERIAL, FUNCTION, concat('MRN_SPE06#20#MRN_SPE04#L#',DESCRIPTION) DESCRIPTION, ORGANISM, IFNULL(LIMITATIONS,'MRN_SPE08#white#NO_LIMIT') LIMITATIONS, 1 Pilot from MRQR_ASSETS A where A.ASSET like 'FA0%' and if('pSTATUS'='',true,STATUS ='pSTATUS') and if('pORGANISM'='',true,ORGANISM ='pORGANISM') limit 100
